purpose: The email is a call for participation and contribution to the SEMLA 2025 symposium.
evidence_sentences: The eighth edition of the Software Engineering for Machine Learning Applications (SEMLA) symposium will take place at Polytechnique Montréal, Montréal, Canada, from June 17 to June 19, 2025.
We invite practitioners and researchers from all related fields to participate.
We accept poster presentations related to any of the SEMLA topics.
